name: Billy's Rocket
description:
🚀 DESCRIPTION 🚀

Billy is a four year old aerospace engineer. Don't question it too much. Use A & D or the left and right arrow keys to balance your rocket through the multiple bosses, then to infinity! Though the side borders may be a viable teleporter to get you out of a sticky situation, it isn't recommended for use often as it can severely mess up your balance. Use it at your own risk! Tip: If a boss is emitting particles underneath it, it is not wise to stay there.

🎮 CONTROLS 🎮

Simply use the "A" & "D" keys on the keyboard to balance Billy's rocket! Alternatively, you can use the left and right arrow keys on the keyboard.

📝 NOTES 📝

* You might have to wait a few seconds for the audio to kick in as Unity WebGL is doing its thing. This isn't an issue in non-browser builds. *

All assets used except the used font ("VT323" from Google Fonts) were created by me, do not use them without permission. Here is the GitHub repository where you can see my progress along the weeks since the start of the jam: https://github.com/VamiqValji/GameOff2020

This was my first public-released game and first game jam, I had a lot of fun!

Thanks for playing!

- Vamiq
